text: The Mambo Kings is a 1992 American French musical drama movie directed by first time director Arne Glimcher and was based on the 1989 novel The Mambo Kings Play Songs of Love by Oscar Hijuelos. It stars Armand Assante, Antonio Banderas, Cathy Moriarty, Tito Puente, Roscoe Lee Browne, Vondie Curtis-Hall, Talisa Soto and Helena Carroll. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1993. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1992 drama movies Category:1992 musical movies Category:American drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:French drama movies Category:French musical movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1950s Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Cuba
title: The Mambo Kings
